name: UFO NO! (itch)
description:
Do whatever you can to survive the endless barrage of missiles in the endless runner/bullet-hell "UFO NO!". Get a chance to be an alien and navigate the dangers of earth through its eyes!

Features include:

-Original sprites!

-Compare high scores with your friends!

-Fly and teleport your way through the explosive storm!

-Gets more difficult as time progresses!

-Power-ups such as lasers and lives can be collected to aid you in your survival!

-Collect coins to upgrade the power-ups!

Special thanks to Virtue Buencamino((Majority of game design) Erika Buencamino(Background and button art), and Hywel Jintalan(cover art) for their artistic contributions!
